src:
Mornar zaustavio Ljubljančane, navijač nasrnuo na Boutrajta [VIDEO]
02 Nov 2019, 20:21 by Darko
Mornar – Cedevita Olimpija 77:70 (15:22, 14:20, 27:14, 21:14)
Košarkaši Mornara naneli su prvi poraz Cedevita Olimpiji u ABA ligi ove sezone. Barani su u 5. kolu regionalnog takmičenja, posle velikog preokreta slavili pred svojim navijačima.
Gosti iz Ljubljane su furiozno počeli utakmicu i posle šest minuta igre vodili su sa 16:2. Mornar se malo oporavio ali je slovenački tim čuvao dvocifrenu prednost sve do sredine treće četvrtine.
Posle vođstva gostiju od 41:52, Mornar je krenuo po pobedu. Do kraja trećeg perioda izabranici Mihaila Pavićevića su napravili seriju od 15:4 i stigli do izjednačenja (56:56).
U istom ritmu odigrali su i poslednju deonicu i dva minuta pre kraja imali su dvocifreno vođstvo (72:62), koja Ljubljančani nisu uspeli da ugroze.
U samom finišu utakmice dogodio se incident, koji je isprovocirao Rajan Boutrajt. U trenucima kada je Džejkob Pulen vodio loptu i čekao da istekne vreme, Boutrajt mu je prišao sa leđa, ukrao loptu i zakucao. To se nije dopalo jednom navijaču Mornara iz prvog reda, koji je uleteo u teren i nasrnuo na Olimpijinog Amerikanca. Brzom reakcijom ostalih aktera utakmice teži incident je izbegnut.



Najefikasniji u Mornaru bili su Pulen sa 17 i Nidam sa 13 poena. Uroš Luković je uz 10 poena imao i čak pet blokada. U ekipi iz Ljubljane Mile-Mekintajer je postigao 14 poena, Boutrajt 13, a Marko Simonović 10 poena.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Sailor stops Ljubljana, fan raids on Boutright [VIDEO]
02 Nov 2019, 19:21 by Darko
Sailor - Cedevita Olympia 77:70 (15:22, 14:20, 27:14, 21:14)
The Navy basketball players inflicted Cedevit Olympia's first defeat in the ABA League this season. Barani celebrated in front of their fans in the 5th round of the regional competition.
The guests from Ljubljana started the game furiously and after six minutes of the game they led with 16: 2. The sailor recovered slightly, but the Slovenian team maintained a double-digit lead until the middle of the third quarter.
After a 41:52 away lead, the Sailor went on to win. By the end of the third period, the selectors of Mihail Pavicevic made a series of 15: 4 and reached the equalizer (56:56).
In the same rhythm, they played the last leg and two minutes before the end they had a double-digit lead (72:62), which the Ljubljana team failed to put at risk.
At the very end of the match, an incident occurred, provoked by Ryan Boutright. In the moments when Jacob Pullen was running the ball and waiting for the time to expire, Boutright approached him from the back, stole the ball and knocked. This was not liked by one Navy fan from the front row, who stormed the field and attacked an Olympic American. With the quick reaction of the other players in the match, a serious incident was avoided.



The most efficient in the Navy were Pulen with 17 points and Nidam with 13 points. Uros Lukovic also had five blocks with 10 points. In the Ljubljana team, Mile-McIntyre scored 14 points, Boutright 13, and Marko Simonovic 10 points.
